name: Stranded (itch) (mzuber, andrewkw, TheHobRob, levinehu, JimmyLech)
description:
Description

Stranded is a 3D first person Action-Adventure RPG  Survival game. After being stranded on a foreign planet the player is forced to gather parts from across the world to repair their ship and blast off! But be careful, there may be monsters lurking in the shadows.

Credits
  • Andrew Kwolek (Developer)
  • Hunter Levine (Developer)
  • James Lechtner (Developer)
  • Maxwell Zuber (Developer)
  • Roberto Jimenez-Martinez (Developer)
Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Interact: Right Click
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Switch Weapons: Scroll
  • Pause/Settings: Escape
  • See Tasks: Tab
